## SeisFluidConnection interface

Information about a connection to the Fluid protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SeisFluidConnection extends SeisFluidConnectionOptionalParams 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [SeisFluidConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnectionoptionalparams.md)

## Remarks

Provided for debugging / informational purposes.

Exposed through [ReadableSeisFluid.connection](./lib-ethers.readableethersfluid.connection.md) and [SeisFluid.connection](./lib-ethers.ethersfluid.connection.md)<!-- -->.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addresses](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.addresses.md) | Record&lt;string, string&gt; | A mapping of Fluid contracts' names to their addresses. |
|  [bootstrapPeriod](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.bootstrapperiod.md) | number | Time period (in seconds) after <code>deploymentDate</code> during which redemptions are disabled. |
|  [chainId](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.chainid.md) | number | Chain ID of the connected network. |
|  [deploymentDate](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.deploymentdate.md) | Date | Date when the Fluid contracts were deployed. |
|  [liquidityMiningFLORewardRate](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.liquiditymininglqtyrewardrate.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Amount of FLO collectively rewarded to stakers of the liquidity mining pool per second. |
|  [provider](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.provider.md) | [SeisProvider](./lib-ethers.ethersprovider.md) | Seis <code>Provider</code> used for connecting to the network. |
|  [signer?](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.signer.md) | [SeisSigner](./lib-ethers.etherssigner.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Seis <code>Signer</code> used for sending transactions. |
|  [startBlock](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.startblock.md) | number | Number of block in which the first Fluid contract was deployed. |
|  [totalStabilityPoolFLOReward](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.totalstabilitypoollqtyreward.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Total amount of FLO allocated for rewarding stability depositors. |
|  [version](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnection.version.md) | string | Version of the Fluid contracts (Git commit hash). |
